unittitle_ssm: John McLaughlin 1981 Irish Hunger Strike Ephemera Collection
abstract_ssm: The collection, collected by John McLaughlin, consists of articles, newspaper clippings and posters related to the Irish Hunger Strikes and other Irish Republicanism activities. Both the American and Irish press are represented.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
subject_ssm: Irish Americans -- New York (State) -- New York -- Political activity.
